description:
The Obelisk Force`s invasion has trapped Kurosaki, Gongenzaka, and Yuzu in the chaos of the underground facility. Meanwhile, Yuuya fights desperately, but Barrett`s Medals make it a hard fight and the onslaught keeps him cornered. At the same time, Sora confesses how he really feels to Reira and Serena, but while he does, Yuuri sneaks up on them from behind...!
Source: crunchyroll
